title: Paris Review
texts:
Thank you for your patience while
we evaluated A Doomsday Prayer
for the Polluting Ape. We regret
that we are unable to publish it,
but we appreciate your interest in
The Paris Review.

Openly, Pedro, you are a pubertal
wit, for what puerile, egalitarian,
hippie trash you've sent our way!
Fuck that contemptible, unreadable
stew! We here are The Paris Review,
don't you get it?
